c_id,
cate_id,

mapper.update:
update category
cate_id = #{cateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cate_name = #{cateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
blog_count = #{blogCount,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_year = #{createYear,jdbcType=DATE},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update category set cate_id = #{cateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cate_name = #{cateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blog_count = #{blogCount,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_year = #{createYear,jdbcType=DATE}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
